Yandex Disk.name: F02c.01
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose that it directly notifies users about changes to its advertising targeting policies?

Yandex Disk.name: F02c.02
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose how it will directly notify users of changes?

Yandex Disk.name: F02c.03
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose the timeframe within which it directly notifies users of changes prior to these changes coming into effect?

Yandex Disk.name: F02c.04
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company maintain a public archive or change log?

Yandex Disk.name: F02c.05
Yandex Disk.description: (For mobile ecosystems): Does the company clearly disclose that it requires apps made available through its app store to directly notify users when the apps change their advertising targeting policies?

Yandex Disk.name: F02c.06
Yandex Disk.description: (For personal digital ecosystems): Does the company clearly disclose that it requires skills made available through its skills store to notify users when the skills change their advertising targeting policies?
